title: Soil mimetic eco-friendly fertilizer gate: Nanoclay reinforced binary carbohydrate for crop effeciency

Potassium play an important role in crop physiology, hence recommended as a basal macronutrient. It is highly mobile, and leaches quickly to become phyto-unavailable, hence for the first time nano...
